title: The Kraken Audio Pack
description: A Sample pack where developers can craft their own sounds for a Kraken-like undersea creature
longDescription:
This is a construction pack that includes numerous audio files for creating sounds of a Kraken-like undersea creature


Audio Demo

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Underwater Ambience
  • Ship Destruction SFX
  • Tentacle Smash SFX
  • Underwater Movement
  • Vocalization


Number of Audio Waves: 112

Number of Audio Cues: 112

Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz 24 Bit)

Do Sound FX loop: (Some of them Do)

Minutes of audio provided: 15:46 Minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)

Documentation: Link

Important/Additional Notes:
